title: The Wonderful Wizard of Oz
description: The classic American fairy tale of Dorothy Gale and her dog, Toto, one of the true staples of American literature, The Wonderful Wizard of Oz has stimulated the imagination of young and old alike for generations.This paperback edition features high-quality black-and-white illustrations by W. W. Denslow.Supports the Common Core State Standards
author: L. Frank Baum
